item.description:
Below is the list of the IFFB films playing at this theater on this day. Those with asterisks include Q&A sessions with the director or others involved in the filmmaking process.

After you've purchased your tickets on line, RSVP YES and write the film(s) you will be going to in the Comments text box. On the right-hand side of this page, you'll see the group's members who will be going to films at that theater the same day. See someone who is going to the same film- wonderful! Click on the envelope icon next to the member's name so you can plan on the easiest and best way to meet-up for that particular film.

All the details for how best to enjoy this year's festival with our group are in the Message Board entry," Our Meetup Group at This Year's IFFB". And if you have any questions, another Message Board entry, " Boston Film Festival Questions" has been set up as well.

Have fun!!!

The time posted for this event is irrelevant- here are the real screening times:
